thread.title: Comment on The Camper You Can Pull With Your Subaru by Sam
thread.title_full: Comment on The Camper You Can Pull With Your Subaru by Sam

author: Sam
title: Comment on The Camper You Can Pull With Your Subaru by Sam
text:
News September 2, 2015 Chris Guill 1 Camper trailers are popular, but many are too heavy to pull behind a small to mid-sized car like the ubiquitous Subaru Outback that roams... 
Camper trailers are popular, but many are too heavy to pull behind a small to mid-sized car like the ubiquitous Subaru Outback that roams snowy mountain towns. 
But the Happier Camper is a different kind of pull behind. At just 1,100 pounds, you can tow this behind a lot of small cars, including the Outback, which has a towing capacity of 2,700 pounds. Shoot, even some Ford Fusions can tow this trailer. 
The lighter weight will also be nice to the gas tank of bigger trucks and SUVs.
